title: Title
noContentInstruction: You can attempt to add new data using the button above. If data exists but isn't displayed, try refreshing the page.
deleteDozentInfo: If you delete this teacher, all asigments to the modules will be lost!
deleteRoomInfo: If you delete this room, all asigments to the modules will be lost!
deleteModuleInfo: If you delete this module, all asigments will be lost!
deleteStudyCourseInfo: If you delete this studycourse, all asigments will be lost!
name: Name
neverForget: So that you don't forget anything.
writeNotes: Here you can write down some notes
colorSelector: Select a color for this module
addExercises: Add an Exercise or a Training session
ModuleDeleteText: This can't be reversed and can cause Issues in the Planer
studycourseTooltip:
You can search not only by name, but also by attribute!
To do this, simply enter {Attribute}:{value} in the search bar. 

You can search for the following attributes:

content:{value}Finds all degree programs with a specified focus
SemesterCount:{value}Finds all degree programs with a specified number of semesters
If you do not specify an attribute, the search is based on the name.

You can also select a range for numerical values by using "<" and ">" instead of ":".
moduleTooltip:
You can search not only by name, but also by attribute!
To do this, simply enter {Attribute}:{value} in the search bar. 

You can search for the following attributes:

dozent:{value} Finds all modules with this lecturer
room:{value} Finds all modules in this room
studyCourse:{value} Finds all modules in the specified degree program
duration:{value} Finds all modules with this duration
If you do not specify an attribute, the system searches for the name. 

By using "<" and ">" instead of ":" you can also select a range for numerical values.
dozentTooltip:
You can search not only by name, but also by attribute!
To do this, simply enter {Attribute}:{value} in the search bar. 

You can search for the following attributes:

salutation:{value} Finds all lecturers with the specified salutation
title:{value} Finds all lecturers with the specified title
email:{value} Finds all lecturers with this email
If you do not specify an attribute, the search is based on first name and surname.

You can also select a range for numerical values by using "<" and ">" instead of ":".
roomTooltip:
You can search not only by name, but also by attribute!
To do this, simply enter {Attribute}:{value} in the search bar. 

You can search for the following attributes:

capacity:{value} Finds all rooms with specified capacity
roomType:{value} Finds all rooms with specified room type
If you do not specify an attribute, the system searches for the room number.

You can also select a range for numerical values by using "<" and ">" instead of ":".
